answers.answer: The only program I know that will work for sure is www.shrinkyourself.com.  It is a program I developed and we are getting spectacular results.  Once you start using chocolate  as your anti anxiety medicine, you are addicted, and you will have to do the hard work of digging into your emotions and learning better ways of dealing with them..that's what we help you learn.  You can also go to a private therapist instead, but if you do, pick one who understands this addiction.
